pages.text: 50|16|ara abasya'i amara manusake srsti karechi ebam tara prabrtti take ye kumantrana deya ta'o amara jani. Ara amara tara graibasthita dhamanira ceye'o nikatatara [1].
50|17|Yakhana tara dane o bame basa du’jana pheresata paraspara (tara amala likhara jan'ya) grahana kare [1]
50|18|se ye katha'i uccarana kare tara kache sada upasthita sanraksanakari rayeche.
50|19|Ara mrtyuyantrana niye eseche (se) satya'i [1]; eta (ta-i) ya theke tumi palate cacchile.
50|20|Ara singaya phumka deya habe, ota'i pratisruta dina.
50|21|Ara sedina pratyeka byakti upasthita habe, tara sange thakabe calaka o saksi [1].
50|22|Abasya'i tumi e dina sanbad'dhe udasina chile, atahpara amara tomadera samane theke parda unmocana karechi. Sutaram aja theke tomara drsti prakhara [1].
50|23|Ara tara sangi pheresata balabe, e'i to amara kache ‘amalanama prastuta.’
50|24|Adesa kara habe, tomara ubhaye [1] jahanname niksepa kara pratyeka udbata kaphirake
50|25|kalyanakara kaje prabala badhadanakari, simalanghanakari o sandeha posanakari [1].
50|26|Ye allahara sange an'ya ilaha grahana karechila, tomara take kathina sastite niksepa kara.
50|27|Tara sahacara sayatana balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Ami take bidrohi kare tulini. Bastuta se'i chila ghora bibhranta [1].
50|28|Allah‌ balabena, ‘tomara amara samane baka-bitandata karo na; ami to tomaderake age'i satarka karechilama.
50|29|‘Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati yulumakari'o na'i.’
50|30|Sedina amara jahannamake jijnesa karaba, ‘tumi ki purna hayecha?’ Jahannama balabe, ‘aro besi ache ki [1]?’
50|31|Ara jannatake nikatastha kara habe muttakidera---kono duratbe thakabe na.
50|32|Era'i pratisruti tomaderake deya hayechila---pratyeka allah‌--- abhimukhi [1], hiphayatakarira jan'ya
50|33|yara gayeba abasthaya dayamaya allahake bhaya kareche ebam binita citte upasthita hayeche
50|34|taderake bala habe, ‘santira sathe tomara tate prabesa kara; eta ananta jibanera dina.’
50|35|Ekhane tara ya kamana karabe ta-i thakabe [1] ebam amara kache rayeche tara'o besi [2].
